abilities.description: Emits special microscopic photon particles as beams of light that slow down anything they touch for 30 seconds
limitations: Photon beams travel at light speed but can be dodged

keyMoments.title: Noro Noro no Mi Revealed
keyMoments.description: Foxy's Devil Fruit power is introduced as he arrives at Long Ring Long Land, though not yet demonstrated in combat.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a unique Paramecia-type Devil Fruit with time-manipulation abilities.

reveals.information: The Noro Noro no Mi was eaten by Foxy the Silver Fox
Allows the user to emit photon particles that slow down objects and people
Slowing effects last exactly 30 seconds and accumulated kinetic energy is released when the effect ends

symbolism: The Noro Noro no Mi represents control and manipulation, fitting Foxy's tactical approach to battles and his exploitation of advantages in competitions.
historicalSignificance: This Devil Fruit has been used by Foxy to win 920 consecutive Davy Back Fights, making it one of the most successfully utilized fruits for strategic purposes rather than pure combat power.
